Name: Tijger & de Vis

Super disappointed.

Name: Tijger & de Vis

Review Text: This place is amazing. Not to mention the cozy atmosphere and friendly staffs, the food is absolutely fantastic. The mussels soup is for the soul. If you are tired of rainy cloudy day of Amsterdam, this is the place you want to brighten your mood.
